10195000.<pc>は\n女神の紫光石を わたされた！<se_nots System Ite:
<pc> received the
Purple Goddess Gem!<se_nots System Item>

52930.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「よう。あんた: <attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Hey. You have good eyes. You're quite a sight to behold, but it's not the time for me yet. Heh. When you reach level 50 in one of the professions, if you want to reach even higher, come see me again.

71229.「オレさまの儀式を受けるのは まだ早え。\n チャラい聖使者の儀式を こなしてか:
You are not ready for my ritual yet.
You'll have to go through the rituals of the flirtatious messenger before you can come back here again.
I'll be waiting for you.

52938.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「オレさまの名:
My name is Kirpappo. You're who has reached level 50, I know.
I heard about you from the flirtatious messenger. I'm very, very short-tempered.
I'd like to perform the ritual quickly, but rule's are rules. I'll explain.
Now, as you already know, the role of the Holy Messenger in the service of the Six Saints is to elevate the seasoned adventurer to a higher level. Now, let us perform the ritual in front of the River of Light.

52939.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「じゃあ さっそ:
So let's get started right away.
As you may already know, the liberation ritual requires offering a stone to the River of Light.
Since we are underground and close to the River of Light, we can receive blessings of the goddess and do the ritual easily.
Here, let me give you this. This is the Purple Goddess Gem.

52941.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「あんたにも:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Did you hear the voice of the Goddess?
The ritual is now complete.

52942.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「……さて 多:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Well, you've done a lot of Holy Messenger
rituals, and you've made it this far.
From now on, I'm going to talk seriously.<bw_break>

52943.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「オレらが あ:
The reason we support adventurers like you is to prepare for the coming battle against the source of the great darkness.
Said to be incomparably more dangerous than the Netherlord Nergel.
That's why we're bringing in more and more strongmen while we can. We don't have time to wait for something to happen.
Well, the ceremony has finally come to a close. This is the last of the rituals that we, the messengers, will be giving.
Oh, that doesn't mean the ordeal is over. It means that the ritual of the Tribulation is over. Do you understand?
The last person waiting for you is the Holy Mother of War, one of the Six Saints whom we Holy Messengers serve.
It is rumored that Our Lady of War has appeared in the Badgley Rocks of Ogreed, and that she resides in a mountain lodge.
Don't keep her waiting much longer.

52950.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「さてと 試練:
Well, the ceremony has finally come to a close. This is the last of the rituals that we, the messengers, will be giving.
Oh, that doesn't mean the ordeal is over. It means that the ritual of the Tribulation is over. Do you understand?
The last person waiting for you is the Holy Mother of War, one of the Six Saints whom we Holy Messengers serve.
It is rumored that Our Lady of War has appeared in the Badgley Rocks of Ogreed, and that she resides in a mountain lodge.
Don't keep her waiting much longer.

52951.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「闘戦聖母さまの:
It seems you have undergone the ritual of Our Lady of War. There's nothing more I can do for you.
I'm looking forward to your success.
